trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around May 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailstoday in the morning around 5:20am, I woke up and went to the backyard to smoke. suddently, a circular object which looks as big as my little finger shoots in the sky and vanishes immediately. it just happens for less than one second so I thought I saw a shooting star. however, I realized that it was day time and the sky was bright and there's no way I could see a shooting star in this condition. 20 minutes later I observed a plane flew at the same height, and realized that there's nothing we know today that can fly that fast.
Summary: An object glows blue light shot in the sky and then vanished.
